```{r, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(quantmod)
```


```{r, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
AUD <- getSymbols("AUD=X",
           from = '2003-01-01',
           to = '2023-03-31',
           src = "yahoo",
           auto.assign = FALSE)

AUD_Price <- Ad(AUD)

colnames(AUD_Price) <- "AUD"
```
